name: Deepest Darkest Dungeon
description:
Escape from a dark labyrinth before the light runs out.

WASD to move. Mouse to look around. Escape is main menu(press twice).

 Pick up torches to replenish your light source. Get 150 gold or more and find a trap door. Items spawn differently every time.

Feedback is very welcome as this is my first released game. Feel free to comment and thanks for playing.
